short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guess english articles (a/an/the) in the current document.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every article (a/an/the) is removed from the selected element on the current webpage. Guess the original article used. See how well you did from a given score.
